metadata.scenario: Customer service interaction about a delayed package

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Hi, I'm calling about a package that's supposed to have been delivered yesterday. The tracking says it's still in transit.

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: Hello! I can certainly look into that for you. Could you please provide me with your tracking number?

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Sure, it's ABC123XYZ. Honestly, I'm getting a bit frustrated. I needed this package by today.

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: Thank you. Let me check the status of your package. Hmm, it appears there was a delay due to unforeseen circumstances. The current estimated delivery date is tomorrow. I apologize for the inconvenience.

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Unforeseen circumstances? What does that even mean? Why wasn't I informed? And what's the guarantee that it'll actually arrive tomorrow?

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: I understand your frustration. Unfortunately, I don't have specific details about the nature of the delay. However, I can assure you that we are doing everything we can to get your package to you as quickly as possible. As for a guarantee, we don't provide absolute guarantees, but the tracking information has been updated to reflect a delivery attempt tomorrow. I can also escalate this issue if the package doesn't arrive by end-of-day tomorrow.

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Okay, I suppose that's all I can do at this point. Can you at least provide me with a way to follow up if it's not delivered tomorrow?

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: Yes, absolutely. You can call this same number, and reference this tracking number, ABC123XYZ, and we'll assist you further. We will also send you an email with the tracking information and a link to our customer support portal where you can track updates. Is there anything else I can help you with?
